title: I get extremely intense chills (especially when I'm listening to songs) and the occurrence of them is a lot higher if compared to the general population.Why do I get such intense goosebumps and why in such a high quantity? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are having an intense emotional reaction to the songs. Do you live primarily a life of the mind? Are you guarded around other people? Music might allow you to have a full range of emotions and feelings you are too guarded to experience immediately with people. You could have a freedom with music you don’t have with ordinary life. Bill
